EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2330.C.Email 2 - Zero Emissions Ebook
EmailTemplate.subject: Things you can start to do today to help save the planet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cut carbon emissions and shrink your energy bills Zero Emission Solution <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2364.Zero.Emissions.ebook.html]]> Turn the zero carbon vision into business opportunity Modernize your radio network with AirScale Base Station, deploy energy features and renewables to cut emissions and costs - boost your profits and help tackle global warming. Read the ebook <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2364.Zero.Emissions.ebook.html]]> ► Did you know that most installed base stations waste 80 percent of the energy they take from the electricity grid? They each emit more than 70 tonnes of CO2 annually on average – which could be cut to just 17 tonnes with a modern base station.
Start today to upgrade base station energy efficiency and add renewable energy generation. Every step you take will lower your operational costs and improve your brand image. © 2016 Nokia.
